title: Christmas tiramisu
description: Need another pudding on the Christmas table? Try using up that panettone in a quick make-ahead tiramisu.
ingredients: 4 shots espresso, or a four-cup cafetiere of strong coffee
50ml/2fl oz amaretto liqueur, or to taste
1 ready-made panettone, cut into1cm/Â½in thick slices
1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out
200ml/7fl oz double cream, whipped until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed
